util/UsingWrapper.js

  1. import * as array from 'array'
  2. import * as collection from 'collection'
  3. import * as lang from 'lang'
  4. import * as math from 'math'
  5. import * as object from 'object'
  6. import * as string from 'string'
  8. import concat from 'lodash/concat'
  9. import drop from 'lodash/drop'
  10. import get from 'lodash/get'
  11. import head from 'lodash/head'
  12. import isSymbol from 'lodash/isSymbol'
  13. import map from 'lodash/map'
  14. import mapValues from 'lodash/mapValues'
  15. import omit from 'lodash/omit'
  17. /**
  18.  * Wrapper allowing to specify one or several paths to use as arguments for an immutadot function call.<br/>
  19.  * Instances are created by calling {@link object.using}.
  20.  * @memberof util
  21.  * @see {@link object.using} for more information.
  22.  * @private
  23.  * @since 0.1.12
  24.  */
  25. class UsingWrapper {
  27.   /**
  28.    * This constructor should not be called directly.<br/>
  29.    * Instances are created by calling {@link object.using}.
  30.    * @param {...(Array|string)} paths The paths to use as arguments.
  31.    * @see {@link object.using} for more information.
  32.    * @since 0.1.12
  33.    */
  34.   constructor(...paths) {
  35.     this._paths = paths
  36.   }
  38.   /**
  39.    * Argument placeholder.
  40.    * @since 0.2.1
  41.    */
  42.   static placeholder = Symbol.for('immutadot.using.placeholder')
  44.   /**
  45.    * Call a function with the specified arguments and possibly some more arguments.
  46.    * @param {function} fn The function to call.
  47.    * @param {Object} object The object to modify.
  48.    * @param {Array|string} path The path of the property to be set.
  49.    * @param {Array} pArgs The arguments for the function call.
  50.    * @return {Object} Returns the updated object.
  51.    * @since 0.1.12
  52.    */
  53.   _call(fn, object, path, pArgs) {
  54.     let callArgs = pArgs
  55.     const args = concat(
  56.       map(this._paths, usingPath => {
  57.         if (isSymbol(usingPath)) {
  58.           const arg = head(callArgs)
  59.           callArgs = drop(callArgs)
  60.           return arg
  61.         }
  62.         return get(object, usingPath)
  63.       }),
  64.       callArgs,
  65.     )
  66.     return fn(object, path, ...args)
  67.   }
  68. }
  70. // Add namespaces functions to the UsingWrapper prototype
  71. [
  72.   array,
  73.   collection,
  74.   { ...omit(object, ['unset']) },
  75.   lang,
  76.   math,
  77.   object,
  78.   string,
  79. ].forEach(namespace => Object.assign(
  80.   UsingWrapper.prototype,
  81.   mapValues(
  82.     namespace,
  83.     fn => function(object, path, ...args) {
  84.       return this._call(fn, object, path, args) // eslint-disable-line no-invalid-this
  85.     },
  86.   ),
  87. ))
  89. export { UsingWrapper, UsingWrapper as default }
